column4: does anyone here know how I can batch encode several .wav files to FLAC? In windows, FLAC had several "front end" GUI's that made batch encoding a drag & drop affair... From the command line in Ubuntu, however, I cannot figure out how to batch anything; only one file at a time
for file in *.wav ; do flacenc -o "`basename $file .wav`.flac" $file ; done , or something along those lines
